root.name: Namco Museum
root.description: OverviewNamco Museum is a basic anthology of all old school Namco arcade games. On the disc (or cartridge) is Namcos bestÂ classic arcade games that most gamers can easily become familiar with and re-live them, complete with old school high score boards. The game was released as a budget title on the PlayStation 2, GameCube, Game Boy Advance, and XBOX platforms.The Games of Namco Museum XBOX Cover ArtPlayStation 2 Cover ArtGameCube Cover Art Pac-ManPac-Man Arrangement GalagaGalaga Arrangement Dig DugDig Dug Arrangement Pole Position Pole Position 2 Ms. Pac-Man GalaxianOther Information 2 hidden games can be unlocked1-2 players can play
